duties_responsibilities.duty: Create detailed schematics and technical drawings for engineering and architectural projects.
Work closely with engineers and architects to convert concepts into finished designs.
Use software programs to develop 2D and 3D models of products and structures.
Communicate design details and requirements to production teams for implementation.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering, Architecture, or related field and at least 2 years of experience in technical drafting, or equivalent combination of education and experience.
